translations.text: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then reduces it to withered chaff.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O  Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ

translations.text: unless Allah wills otherwise.<sup foot_note=77612>1</sup> He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa ma shaa Allahuinnahu yaAAlamu aljahra wama yakhfa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.<sup foot_note=77613>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But it will be shunned by the most wretched,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: who will burn in the greatest Fire,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

translations.text: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
